name: brashness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that shows a lot of confidence and not much respect: He developed a reputation for brashness. He later confided that his brashness masked his fear of failure.
More examplesFewer examplesHe has had to learn how to control his brashness and insensitivity. This African American woman needed all her brashness and brains to earn a law degree surrounded by white, male peers.With the enthusiasm and brashness of the young, we believed we knew everything.
